name: Endless Drift
description:
Drift through an endless track while trying to score as many points as possible! You will be scored on how much you drift and how long you can drive before crashing into a wall.

Controls:

A/D - Steer

R - Restart

Esc - Back to menu

Watch the devlogs to see how I made this game.

Consider supporting me at buymeacoffee.com
